text:
AFAIK it is still not possible to do GDPR-compliant API contact deletions. There is this idea: <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/HubSpot-Ideas/GDPR-deletion-via-API-call/idi-p/201590>
We have faced the same road blocker :disappointed:

BTW, HubSpot's position on this is that if you want to do this, you have to delete the contacts on the UI (and I am not even sure it actually allows to do GDPR-compliant deletion from multiple contacts, you have to do it one by one)
